input.sentences: too bad their lazy son would n't help them .
they needed help with the fruit .
they provided him a place to live still .
he wo n't get any pie .
output.sentences: It's harvest time, but where's Duke?
Oh, there he is, riding on a ferry boat and skipping out on the harvest like the lazy son he is.
That's fine, we got plenty of fruit right here.
But it is kind of lonely on the big farm without Duke here.
We'll save Duke a fruit tart just in case he decides to come home.
